screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .sat file in ShareCAD
screenshot.caption: SAT file open in ShareCAD

description: The SAT extension stands for Standard ACIS Text. As that acronym may have led you to guess, SAT files are stored in an ASCII text format. The data stored within SAT files can also be saved in binary if needed, using the .SAB file format.
NOTE: The SAT format is used across many different industries, including CAD, CAM, CAE, AEC, CMM, 3D animation, and shipbuilding.
